682:1: atha khalu vijayā nāma devī tatraiva parṣadi sannipatitā sanniṣaṇṇābhūvam |
682:2: sa svakaṃ maṇḍalopacaryā sādhanavidhiṃ bhāṣayati sma ||
682:3: ādau tāvad vivikte deśe pracchanne rahasi pañcaraṅgikacūrṇena śuklakṛṣṇapītaraktaharitaiḥ cūrṇaiḥ pañcamyā śubhe sitakṛṣṇayoḥ pakṣe caturthyā vā maṇḍalamālikhet |
682:6: madhye sārthavāhaśca mudrāmaṇḍalākāraṃ induvarṇābhaṃ pūrvottare koṇe jayā mudrā ardhacandrākārasitaṃ dakṣiṇapūrvakoṇe vijayā mudrā tṛkoṇākāraṃ pītanirbhāsaṃ,
682:7: paścimadakṣiṇakoṇe ajitāyā mudraṃ bandhākāraṃ raktāvabhāsaṃ uttarapaścimakoṇe aparājitāyā mudraṃ vajrākāraṃ kṛṣṇanirbhāsaṃ sarvataśca mudrāṇāṃ jvālāmālinaḥ karttavyāḥ ||
682:8: pūrvavacaukṣasamācāreṇa bhūtvā catuḥkoṇa catvāraḥ pūrṇakalaśāḥ sthāpayitavyāḥ āmrapallavapracchāditamukhāḥ sarvavrīhiratnaparipūrṇagarbhāḥ |
682:9: madhye tu sārthavāhasya tumbureḥ pañcamaṃ kalaśaṃ tathaivāmrapallavapracchāditamukhaṃ pratyagravastrāvakuṇṭhitāśca kāryāḥ |
682:10: tacca tathaiva balinivedyapuṣpādayo yathā mudrāstathaiva kāryā |
682:11: tadvarṇaśca pūṣpadhūpagandhādayaḥ tat sarvaṃ tathaiva kāryam |
682:13: ardharātre madhyāhne cābhicāruke pratyūṣe pauṣṭike aparāhne śāntikamastaṃ gate vā savitari karmatrayaṃ cāpi yathākālopadiṣṭamaṇḍalahomajapasādhaneṣu prayoktavyam ||
682:14: śucino dakṣaśīlāścaṃ strīpuruṣādayaḥ avyathitāśca praveśayitavyāḥ saradārikāśca guhyamantradhāriṇo ādau praveśayitavyāḥ |
682:15: prāṅmukhaṃ sthāpayitvā vijayāyā mūlamantreṇodakamabhimantrya saptābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā sarveṣāmabhyaṣiñcet |
682:16: sakṛdahorātroṣitānāṃ śucivastraprāvṛtānāmaṣṭau prabhṛti yāvadekaṃ prāṅmukhaṃ paścāddvāreṇa praveśayet pratyagramukhapracchāditāṃ kṛtvā ekaikaṃ vijayāyā mudraṃ baddhvā añjaliṃ kṛtvā pītapuṣpa datvā kṣipāpayet |
682:17: vijayāyā mantraṃ kṛtvā mukhamutsādya maṇḍalaṃ darśāpayet |
682:21: pūrvaṃ tāvad devīnāmāhvānanamantreṇa bhrātṛsahitānāṃ mūlamantreṇa yathocittaiḥ puṣpairāvāhayet |
682:22: pūrvaṃ paścād dhūpaṃ datvā yathocitaṃ namaskāraṃ kṛtvā yatrotsahate śiṣyaḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā vā sa tasmiṃ maṇḍale bahirabhiṣecayitavyaḥ rājavat sarvopakaraṇaiḥ yathābhirucitairvā mantraṃ maṇḍalācāryasya tuṣṭiryena vā tuṣyeta tayābhiṣecayet |
682:23: abhiṣicya ca eka vā trayo vā abhiṣecanīyaḥ āryābhiṣekeṇa |
682:25: śṛṇu kulaputrakuladuhiturvā labdhābhiṣekastvamanujñātaḥ sarvadevatābhiśca sabhrātṛsahitaiśca svamantratantreṣu yatheṣṭaṃ maṇḍalamālikhya svamantrāṇāṃ vidhiniyamacaryākalpavistarāṃ dadasveti vaktavyaḥ |
682:29: tato maṇḍalācāryeṇa candanodakenābhyukṣya arghaṃ dattvā svamantreṇaiva dhūpapuṣpādibhiḥ devatāṃ visarjayitavyā |
682:31: gṛhya ca svaṃ pratyaṃśaṃ tritīyabhāgaṃ sarvamanāthebhyo dātavyam |
682:33: taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ suliptaṃ kṛtvā suśobhitaṃ vigatarajaskaṃ yatheṣṭayo gantavyam |
682:35: sarve śiṣyāḥ pracchanne rahasi vigatajanasampāte svadevatāmudrāṃśca bandhāpayitavyāḥ |
682:36: taireva mantraiḥ pūrvanirdiṣṭairmantraiḥ suviśeṣataḥ sarvamantrā siddhiṃ gacchantīti ||
682:67: tathaiva mudrāṃ sarvatraṃ bhīmāṃ caiva viyojayet |
682:70: tathaiva mukhaveṣṭaṃ vā raktacchatraṃ tathaiva ca ||
682:71: āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ raktaṃ caiva samālabhet |
682:85: striyaṃ vā yadi vā puṃsaṃ dārakaṃ vātha dārikām |
682:91: sādhyamānā hi siddhyante sarve māheśvarā gaṇāḥ |
682:97: jyeṣṭhamaṣṭastathā hastaṃ sapta ṣaṭ pañca madhyamāḥ |
682:99: jyeṣṭhe śāntikaṃ kuryā tathā madhye tu pauṣṭikam |
682:107: aparājitā tu devyā vai praṇamya jinavarātmajam |
682:118: tathaiva tat kuryāt sarvaṃ varjayitvā tu varṇato ||
682:121: madhyasthe savasṛje deśe tatrasthe tu mahītale |
682:124: tat sarvaṃ kṣiprato mantrī sarvaṃ caiva niyojayet ||
682:131: ālikhya maṇḍale hyatra kṛṣṇavarṇā tu bhūtale |
682:134: tat sarvaṃ pūrvavat kṛtvā paścāt karma samārabhet ||
682:143: tantre tu sarvato mantraiḥ kravyādaistu sakaśmalaiḥ |
682:146: tumburākhyaṃ vāmato martyāṃ vajradhṛk taṃ nibodhatām ||
682:154: pracchanne rahasi visrabdhe svagṛhe vāvavarake'pi ca ||
682:167: tat sarvamālikhed dhīmāṃ mantraṃ yatnāddhi cetasā |
682:173: ālikhet sarvato mantrī catuḥkoṇe tu sarvataḥ |
682:186: yathaiva maṇḍale sarvaṃ tat sarvaṃ ālikhet paṭe ||
682:190: punnāgaṃ caiva mantrajñaiḥ nityaṃ pratimāsu yojayet ||
682:192: saralaṃ devadāruṃ ca kāśmīraṃ caiva saghaṇṭakam ||
682:197: vakulaṃ tilakaṃ caiva kāṣṭhaṃ saptacchadaṃ tathā |
682:203: aśvatthe śāntikaṃ vindyāt kāṣṭhe cāpi mahītale |
682:219: diśāṃ ca sarvato mantrī yatheṣṭaṃ vā karma samārabhet |
682:227: dīrghaśo vitastimātraṃ vā nāvaṃ caiva sukārayet |
682:229: jayā kārayed dhīmān tumburuṃ ca viśeṣataḥ |
682:231: aparājitā kṛṣṇavarṇā vai śuklāṃ caiva anāmikām |
682:234: ajitā saumyaveśā tu kartavya tha sarvataḥ ||
682:239: raupyaṃ tāmramayīṃ vāpi pratimā khyātā vaśāvahā |
682:240: ākarṣaṇaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ kāṃsī hyuktā mahītale ||
682:248: siddhyante sarvataḥ kṛtvā pratimābhiśca yojitā | iti ||
682:249: atha tumburuḥ sārthavāhaḥ sarveṣāṃ sādhanavidhānaṃ samācakṣate sāmānyataḥ |
682:250: dantamayīṃ pratimāṃ kṛtvā devīnāṃ kanyasāṅgulipramāṇāmatigupte pradeśe āhūya mūlamantraiḥ vāmahastena dhūpaṃ datvā jayāyā mūlamantraṃ japet |
682:251: aṣṭasahasramaṣṭaśataṃ vā japaṃ kṛtvā yanmanīṣitaṃ tat sarvaṃ svapne kathayati |
682:255: yatheṣṭaṃ vā sattvavaśīkaraṇe uttamasādhanādiṣu karmāṇi nimittāni darśayati |
682:260: yāmicchati rājakanyāṃ mahādhanopetāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇīṃ tāṃ labhate |
682:261: jātīpuṣpaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kusumaiḥ pratimā ekaikā āhantavyā trisandhyaṃ saptadivasāni aṣṭaśati |
682:276: gorocanāmabhimantrya ātmavaktre tilakaṃ kṛtvā yaṃ prekṣati so'sya vaśo bhavati |
682:279: evaṃ vastradhūpagandhamālyapuṣpopakaraṇaviśeṣāṃśca yajñopavītadaṇḍakamaṇḍalukāṣṭhopānahāśayanayānāsanabhojanādiṣu sarvopakaraṇaviśeṣāṃ saptābhimantritāṃ kṛtvā ātmanā parairvā kārāpayet |
682:281: māṣajambulikāṃ saptābhimantritāṃ kṛtvā pracchanne sthāne devīnāmagrataḥ agnauḥ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt trisandhyaṃ sapta divasāni sarve raṇḍāḥ sarve ḍākinyaḥ sarve bhūtagrahāḥ sarve ca kaśmalāḥ vaśā bhavanti |
682:282: kiṅkarānuvartino yojanaśatagamanāgamane ca gomūtreṇa piṣṭvā pūrvāhe piṇḍārakabandakaṃ āmrabandakaṃ ca gṛhya sahasrasampāditaṃ kṛtvā pādaṃ lepayet |
682:283: divyodakena jyeṣṭhodakena vā sarvakarmasu yojya sarvapūjiteṣu ca kalpeṣu paramantravidhānenāpi |
682:285: yatra maṇḍale sārthavāhasya tumbururbhagavāṃ dharmasvāmī buddhaḥ sarvasattvānāmagraḥ śākyamunirabhilikhitaḥ tasmiṃ maṇḍale dṛṣṭasamayasya karmāṇi kartavyāni |
682:289: marakatendranīlapadmarāgasphaṭikādibhiḥ pravālāṅkurāśmavaidūryaratnaviśeṣaiḥ suvarṇarūpyamayairvā pratimāṃ kṛtvā devīnāṃ kanyasāṅgulapramāṇā yavaphalamātraṃ vā muktāphalaṃ vā pratimāṃ kṛtvā nauyānasamārūḍhā caturbhaginīnāṃ sabhrātṛsahitānāmantaśaḥ pratimāṃ kṛtvā pūrvavad yathābharaṇapraharaṇaviśeṣāṇāṃ devīnāṃ śucau deśe candanakuṅkumakarpūrodakābhyaṣikte taireva maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā atigupte sthāne mārgaśīrṣamāse kārttikapūrṇamāsyāṃ vā anye vā sitapakṣe prātihārakakusumāgame anye vā śukle'hani praśaste tithau candrabhārgavavāre rohiṇīrevatyanurādhājyeṣṭhanakṣatrā bhikṣāhāreṇa udakasaktavāhāreṇa vā haviḥ phalabhakṣaṇe vā mocāmraphalasanālikeraiḥ pūrvaṃ jayāyāḥ akṣaralakṣaṃ japet |
682:290: japtā kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ tathāgatabimbodayamaṇḍalaṃ tumbururdṛṣṭvā kṛtarakṣaḥ śuklāmbaradharaḥ sragvī mālatīkusumāvabaddhaśiraskaḥ ahorātroṣito bhūtvā sādhanamāviśet |
682:291: pūrvavadarghaṃ kṛtvā jātīkusumaughaṃ mahākṛpāpiṇḍītagaranāgakesarapunnāgairvā eteṣāmanyatamena navairvā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā mālatīkusumānāṃ pañca pañca gṛhītvā devīnāṃ tāḍayet |
682:298: ubhāvapyetau mahādevyau svamantrayonijau sarvakarmāṇi kurvanti pūrvavat |
682:300: vijayāyāḥ pītapuṣpaiḥ ajitāyāḥ raktapuṣpaiḥ tadvarṇaiścopakaraṇaviśaiṣaiḥ sarvakarmāṇi sādhayet |
682:303: pūrvavat tathāgatamaṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā tumburoḥ sārthavāhasya ajitāyāstāmramayī raktacandanamayīṃ vā mama kalpe tu rūpyarāgamayī pītanirbhāsaḥ gorocanakuṅkumāktā ca kāryā |
682:310: yanmayoditaṃ maṇḍale'smiṃ sarvaṃ tathaiva kartavyaṃ svamantreṇaiva |
682:311: śmaśa nāṅgāreṇa śmaśānabhasmenā vā devīnāṃ pratimāṃ likhya kṛṣṇapuṣpairabhyarcya śatrornāmaṃ gṛhya japet guhye pradeśe śmaśāne vā |
682:317: arīn nāśayati stambhayati śoṣayati mahārākṣasena gṛhṇāpayati gotrotsādaṃ vā karoti sādhakasyecchayā |
682:322: ayatnenaiva śmaśānāṅgāraṃ gṛhya caṇḍālakapāle nāmamālikhet pratibimbaṃ vā striyaḥ puruṣasya vā likhet |
682:324: bhage'ṅguliṃ datvā ca pratibimbe kapālasthe tatkṣaṇād dahyamānā strī āgacchati yojanaśatādapi |
682:330: tad vadatu bhagavāṃ dharmasvāmī buddho svamantraṃ ca |
682:331: yā cāsmākamanukampārthaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca hitāya sukhāya svamantracaryāt ||
682:332: atha bhagavāṃ tathāgataḥ śākyādhirājatanayaḥ tāṃ kanyāṃmīṣadavalokya bhrātṛsahitāmimāṃ vācamudīrayanti sma |
682:333: na yūyaṃ kanyakā bhrātṛpañcamā tathāgatasya guṇamahātmyaṃ mantracaryāprabhāvaṃ śrotuṃ caryāṃ vā pratipadyetum |
682:334: ko'nya sadevake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ pūjāyāṃ śrotuṃ caryāṃ vā pratipadyetum |
682:335: varjayitvā utpāditabodhicittānāṃ daśabhūmipratiṣṭhiteśvarāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvamantracaryānirhārasamanupraveśasarvatathāgatajñānamāyāprativiśiṣṭamūrdhvajaḥ ko'nyaṃ śaktaḥ śrotuṃ jñātuṃ vā nirdeśaṃ mantracaryāsamanupraveśamācakṣituṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca prakāśayitum |
682:336: varjayitvā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyak sambuddhānāṃ tatpratipannānāṃ ca sattvānāmutpāditavodhicittānām |
682:340: evamuktvā tāḥ kanyakāḥ tṛśaraṇaparigṛhītāḥ utpāditabodhicittāśca niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya tūṣṇīmbhūtā iti ||
682:341: āryamañjuśrīmūlakalpāt bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakāt mahāyānavaipulyasūtrāt ṣaṭcatvāriṃśatimaḥ paṭalavisarād dvitīyasādhanopayikamaṇḍalapraveśānuvidhiścatuḥkumāryapaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāptamiti |
